channel.title: [PI]Frost Dragons[PI]

item.title: [PI]Frost Dragons[PI]
item.dc:creator: @nicke924 nicke924
item.description:
@nicke924 wrote:

[quote=“Impious Lols, post:6, topic:401952”][quote author=nicke924 link=topic=499006.msg3649411#msg3649411 date=1309628256]

Or leech one of those fancy shit DSPK clients and adapt it to your server.

Mind helping ?
[/quote]
Go to Source Download section.
Find a DSPK one (Usually in description, or you can just look at pictures)
Download the client.
Look for the ints.
Take the models out of the cache that the ints call for.
Use the ints and the models in your client :D.[/quote]
I can’t find the models neither can I find the ints.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Frost Dragons[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“nicke924, post:5, topic:401952”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=499006.msg3649391#msg3649391 date=1309626845]
Or leech one of those fancy shit DSPK clients and adapt it to your server.
[/quote]

Mind helping ?[/quote]
Go to Source Download section.
Find a DSPK one (Usually in description, or you can just look at pictures)
Download the client.
Look for the ints.
Take the models out of the cache that the ints call for.
Use the ints and the models in your client :D.

Read full topic

item.description:
@nicke924 wrote:

Impious Lols:

This is client sided and I’m pretty sure if you google “Cache packed Frost Dragons”, I believe somewhere it has the ints and models for them. But it’s client sided, not server sided.

Alright.
I’ll try it.
